title: PASSEPORT CARBONE
desc_preview: A web-app broadcasted to the student of my school to make them aware of their carbon footprint
description: Passeport Carbone is a web app created within the junior enterprise for the University of Technology of Troyes, aiming to raise student awareness about their carbon footprint. I led UI/UX design and handled most of the front-end development.

title: presences
desc_preview: A web-app made in my previous internship which goal was to organise the usage of the office’s desktop
description: Présences is a web app developed by Makina Corpus to manage office space in a flex-office context. During my internship, I redesigned the web and mobile UI and added several quality-of-life features, the most significant being authentication.

title: v-lock
desc_preview: A mobile application that can be use to store and secure your own bike in town
description: V-Lock is a student startup from Troyes, France, that developed a connected, solar-powered bike locking system. I collaborated on the creation of the mobile app, focusing on UI/UX design and mobile development.
